messages.title: FIVE YEARS OF FAILURE AND CRISIS IN THE NHS WITH THE CONSERVATIVES
messages.content: Closed down A&E and downgraded Queen Mary's. Wasted £3 billion on a top-down reorganisation. Scrapped Labour's guarantee of a GP appointment within 24 hours. Thousands of fewer nurses and frontline staff. A&E waiting times highest since records began.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bring back services to Queen Mary's. 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs. Guaranteed GP appointment within 48 hours or on the same day if you need it. Guaranteed cancer tests and results in one week. Fairer access to local mental health services.

issues.health: Bring back services to Queen Mary's. 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs. Guaranteed GP appointment within 48 hours or on the same day if you need it. Guaranteed cancer tests and results in one week. Fairer access to local mental health services.

quotes.text: Make sure these doors stay open on May 7th

images.caption: Ibby's pledges to secure the future of our NHS

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet focuses heavily on the NHS and criticizes the past performance of the Conservatives regarding healthcare.
